name: Tankgeon
description:
"My colleagues at the university mocked me for this endeavour. They would say such things as 'The sword doesn't exist,' 'You're not going to make it back in one piece,' and 'You don't even have hands, how will you be able to use the sword?'

"I said to them, 'I 'm an archaeologist first, and a tank second. I will get that sword even if I run out of fuel trying! It is my dream. No! IT IS MY DESTINY!'"

-Dr. Tank, Ph.D

A short dungeon experience with an unlikely protagonist. Shoot your way through puzzles with such classic projectiles as missiles, bouncing plasma, and boomerangs.

WASD to Move, Space to Shoot, Arrow Keys to control Boomerang.

Made with GameMaker by Brody Richards and Jess Martin
